title: Weather App
description: A web application that displays real-time weather information based on user location or input.

title: Task Manager
description: An application for managing tasks, allowing users to create, update, and delete tasks with due dates and priorities.

title: E-commerce Website
description: A platform for online buying and selling with features such as product catalog, user authentication, and shopping cart functionality.

title: Fitness Tracker
description: An app to track fitness activities, allowing users to log workouts, set fitness goals, and monitor progress over time.

title: Recipe App
description: An application that provides a collection of recipes, allowing users to search, save favorites, and create shopping lists based on chosen recipes.
